title: Finding the Vertical Asymptote
text: Determine what x-value makes the inside of the logarithmic functon equal to $$0$$ (where the function is undefined). The x-value will be the value of the vertical asymptote.

title: Vertical Asymptote
text: When $$x=-1$$, the inside of the logarithmic functon is equal to $$0$$. Therefore, the vertical asymptote is $$x=-1$$.
